title: THE FOES OF OUR OWN HOUSEHOLD (1917)
features: THE FOES OF OUR OWN HOUSEHOLD (1917)
description: In addition to his political accomplishments, Theodore Roosevelt (1858-1919), the twenty-sixth president of the United States, is known for his achievements as a naturalist, explorer, hunter, soldier, and author.

author: {'avatar': 'https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/A1jv2CEphyL._SY600_.jpg', 'name': 'Theodore Roosevelt', 'about': ['Theodore Roosevelt (/ˈroʊzəvɛlt/ ROH-zə-velt;[a] October 27, 1858 – January 6, 1919) was an American statesman, author, explorer, soldier, naturalist, and reformer who served as the 26th President of the United States from 1901 to 1909.
